phases.title: Emergency Controls & Quick Wins
phases.description: Address the most critical legal and ethical risks immediately to reduce exposure

tasks.title: Add Candidate Transparency Notice
tasks.description: Add clear notice to job application forms informing candidates that AI screening is used
tasks.deliverable: Updated application form with AI disclosure notice

tasks.title: Extend Log Retention to 6 Months
tasks.description: Update logging infrastructure to retain decision logs for minimum 6 months
tasks.deliverable: Updated log retention policy and infrastructure config

tasks.title: Formalize Human Override Process
tasks.description: Document and enforce mandatory human review step before any candidate rejection
tasks.deliverable: Formal SOP for human oversight of AI screening decisions

tasks.title: Initiate Risk Management Framework
tasks.description: Establish a basic risk register and assign a risk owner for the AI system
tasks.deliverable: Risk register, risk owner assigned, initial risk assessment

phases.title: Data Governance & Documentation
phases.description: Build the data governance foundation and complete required technical documentation

tasks.title: Conduct Bias Audit on Training Data
tasks.description: Hire third-party auditor to assess demographic representation and bias in training dataset
tasks.deliverable: Bias audit report with remediation recommendations

tasks.title: Implement Data Lineage Tracking
tasks.description: Document and automate tracking of all training data sources and transformations
tasks.deliverable: Data lineage map and automated tracking system

tasks.title: Create Model Card and System Documentation
tasks.description: Produce complete model card, updated architecture docs, and known limitations register
tasks.deliverable: Model card, architecture document, limitations register

tasks.title: Complete DPIA and Fundamental Rights Assessment
tasks.description: Conduct Data Protection Impact Assessment and Fundamental Rights Impact Assessment
tasks.deliverable: DPIA report, Fundamental Rights Impact Assessment report

phases.title: Technical Controls & Robustness
phases.description: Implement technical safeguards including explainability, monitoring and security

tasks.title: Implement Explainability Features
tasks.description: Integrate SHAP or LIME to provide human-readable explanations for screening decisions
tasks.deliverable: Explainability module integrated into screening pipeline

tasks.title: Perform Adversarial Testing
tasks.description: Conduct adversarial robustness testing to identify model manipulation vulnerabilities
tasks.deliverable: Adversarial testing report with remediation actions

tasks.title: Implement Decision Audit Trail
tasks.description: Build structured logging of every screening decision with inputs, outputs and confidence scores
tasks.deliverable: Decision audit trail system with searchable log interface

tasks.title: Update Cybersecurity Assessment
tasks.description: Commission fresh penetration test and cybersecurity risk assessment for the AI system
tasks.deliverable: Updated penetration test report and remediation plan

phases.title: Governance, Registration & Monitoring
phases.description: Complete formal governance obligations, EU registration, and establish ongoing monitoring

tasks.title: Complete Conformity Assessment
tasks.description: Engage notified body to perform conformity assessment and obtain CE marking
tasks.deliverable: Conformity assessment certificate, CE marking applied

tasks.title: Register in EU AI Database
tasks.description: Submit system registration to the EU AI Act public database

tasks.title: Deploy Post-Market Monitoring System
tasks.description: Implement automated monitoring for bias drift, accuracy degradation and anomaly detection
tasks.deliverable: Monitoring dashboard with alerting and monthly reporting

tasks.title: Deliver AI Literacy Training to Staff
tasks.description: Design and deliver mandatory AI literacy and oversight training for all recruiters and HR staff
tasks.deliverable: Training program, completion records, competency assessments
